Support & Help

Find answers to common questions or get in touch for additional support.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I access the volume controls?

Volume Control lives in your menu bar. Simply click the menu bar icon to access live volume sliders for both system and Apple Music volume. You can adjust everything instantly without opening settings.

How do I make the app start automatically?

In Volume Control settings, enable "Launch at Login" to have the app start automatically when you turn on your Mac. This ensures your volume controls are always available when you need them.

Can I control system volume and Apple Music volume separately?

Yes! This is one of the key features. The menu bar interface provides separate sliders for system volume and Apple Music volume, allowing you to balance your music with other audio sources like Discord, Zoom calls, or system sounds independently.

Why would I want to control Apple Music volume separately?

Independent volume control is perfect when you're listening to music while on Discord, Zoom calls, or using other apps. You can lower your music without affecting other audio sources, keeping your voice chat clear while still enjoying background music.

Does the app affect my Mac's performance or battery life?

No, Volume Control is designed to be lightweight and efficient. It runs quietly in the background with negligible impact on your Mac's performance or battery life, using minimal system resources and permissions.

What permissions does the app need?

Volume Control only needs Apple Music automation permission, and only if you want to control Apple Music volume independently. The app uses minimal permissions and respects your privacy - no data is collected or transmitted.
